author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, remove *some* deprecation warnings from `DQMServices/Components`.
In response to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37665#issuecomment-1113664103
Technical, part of the migrations in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404.
Profited to clean-up headers and merging plugin header with implementations.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: remove some deprecation warnings from `DQMServices/Components`
